about.name: Talha Karasu
about.subtitle: Embedded Systems - R&D Engineer
paragraphs: I'm a final-year Computer Engineering student focused on delivering integrated R&D solutions by combining hardware and embedded software. I work on firmware development and PCB design for motor control and power electronics, managing projects meticulously from prototype to production. With strong analytical thinking, attention to detail, and a perfectionist approach, I aim to deliver efficient and reliable results in complex systems. Working with VoltaTEAM, I played an active role in designing and developing electric vehicle technologies, gaining solid experience in teamwork, leadership, and project management.

projects.title: ESP-based Smart Plug (WiFi Controlled)
projects.description: Designed and shipped multiple hardware variants of a WiFi-controlled smart plug based on ESP microcontrollers. Each variant accepts 220V AC and provides switched outputs up to 16A per channel, I led PCB design and firmware integration for 1/2/3-channel SKUs.
features: Up to 16 A per channel switching capability
Mobile app control (WiFi) and MQTT/HTTP APIs

projects.title: Battery Management System (BMS)
projects.description: In-house designed 10x10 cm, 6-layer BMS for a 14s7p pack. Features ADC-based cell voltage monitoring, NTC temperature sensing, multiplexer-controlled MOSFET passive balancing, UART integration with vehicle control systems and on-board charger, and fail-safe shutdown on communication loss.
features: NTC temperature sensing and automatic cutoff
UART communication with VCS & On-Board Charger
Fail-safe automatic shutdown on comms loss

projects.title: BLDC Motor Driver for Electric Vehicle
projects.description: Developed a compact, six-layer BLDC motor driver implementing field-oriented control with PID current and velocity loops. The hardware supports 12–85V input, high-current outputs, phase voltage/current sensing, and robust protections; presented at Teknofest 2025 and received an award.

projects.title: Ground Station for Electric Vehicle
projects.description: Built a ground station for EV telemetry that aggregates real-time data from vehicle control boards over serial links and LoRa, logs sessions reliably, and visualizes telemetry in a C# GUI for diagnostics and race operations.
features: Real-time telemetry from vehicle control boards
Transmits speed, temperature, voltage, remaining energy

projects.title: Göktim Academy - Robotics & Embedded Systems Instructor
projects.description: Taught foundational embedded systems and robotics through hands-on labs and weekly projects. Covered sensor interfacing, microcontroller communication, and practical troubleshooting to help students build working prototypes.

projects.title: Efficiency Challenge Participation (2022-2024)
projects.description: Contributed across telemetry, motor driver development, and team leadership for the Teknofest Efficiency Challenge. Roles included telemetry engineer, motor driver lead, and team captain for the hydrogen-supported vehicle.
